entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:37 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
